userStories.title: Investigate AgentSpeaker component locations
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to locate all instances of the AgentSpeaker component and identify where the green color is applied so I can make comprehensive changes.
acceptanceCriteria: Locate AgentSpeaker component file(s) in codebase
Identify all places where green color is applied (styled-components, inline styles, CSS classes)
Document current color value (hex/Tractor token) being used

userStories.notes: AgentSpeaker is a GraphQL type. Color assignment in src/states/call/speakers/speakers.utility.ts:49,64 sets variant:'green'. Mapped to 'primary-500' in src/constants/style.constants.ts:61. Used in SpeakerAvatar, TranscriptionItem, PlayerSpeakersList, PlayerSpeakerTimeline components.

userStories.title: Update AgentSpeaker color to blue
userStories.description: As a user, I want the AgentSpeaker component to display in blue so that it improves visual clarity during calls.
acceptanceCriteria: Replace green color with appropriate blue from Tractor design system
Update styled-components or relevant styling files
Ensure color change applies to all instances of AgentSpeaker
No visual regressions in component layout or other properties
AgentSpeaker displays in blue in all locations
No color conflicts with surrounding UI elements
Verify across different call states if applicable
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
userStories.notes: Changed variant from 'green' to 'blue' for both AgentSpeaker and VirtualAgentSpeaker in src/states/call/speakers/speakers.utility.ts. Blue variant maps to 'informative-500' token. All tests pass, typecheck passes, lint passes. Browser verification not completed due to staging auth requirements.
